00002 #include <process/process.h>

00004 extern process_t* get_current_process();
00005 extern process_t* scheduler_return_process(unsigned int iter);

00007 unsigned char syscallProcessValid(unsigned int pid)
00008 {
00009         //Iterate untill found the correct PID
00010         process_t* iterator = 0;
00011         unsigned int number = 0;
00012 
00013         for (;;)
00014         {
00015                 iterator = scheduler_return_process(number);
00016 
00017                 if (iterator == 0) return 0;
00018                 if (iterator->m_ID == pid) break;
00019 
00020                 number = number + 1;
00021         }
00022 
00023         return 1;
00024 }

00026 int syscallGetPid(unsigned int iter)
00027 {
00028         if (scheduler_return_process(iter) == 0) return -1;
00029         return scheduler_return_process(iter)->m_ID;
00030 }

00035         //Iterate untill found the correct PID

00053 void syscallGetName(char* StrLocation, unsigned int pid)
00054 {       
00055         //Iterate untill found the correct PID
00056         process_t* iterator = 0;
00057         unsigned int number = 0;
00058 
00059         for (;;)
00060         {
00061                 iterator = scheduler_return_process(number);
00062 
00063                 if (iterator == 0)
00064                 {
00065                         strcpy(StrLocation, "Unknown");
00066                         return;
00067                 }
00068                 if (iterator->m_ID == pid) break;
00069 
00070                 number = number + 1;
00071         }
00072 
00073         //Copy the name into the StrLocation
00074         strcpy(StrLocation, iterator->m_Name);
00075 }

00077 void syscallKillCurrentProcess()
00078 {
00079         scheduler_kill_current_process();
00080 }

00082 void syscallRequestExit(int returnValue)
00083 {
00084         get_current_process()->m_returnValue = returnValue;
00085         scheduler_kill_current_process();
